divs: sighting detailswhen i was 4 or five. it was october of 1983. my mother took me with her now ex-husband. to look for a new place to live. we were in claridge pa. this place was a yellow duplex apartment right across the parking lot to the fire station\ fire hall. we were in the back yard and from what i can remeber the sun was just starting to go down and my parents were talking with the owners of the house. i think they were an older couple maybe in their 50's at the time. i could be wrong while they were talkin i was told to be good and not interupt. during this time i noticed something directly over top of us. it was round it had alot of lights and i had never seen anything like this and didn't know what it was. so i said" mommy look at the funny airplane" she would tell me "not now, don't interupt. wait till were done then tell me what you want." and she would continue on with her conversation. and i tried repeadetly to get her to look. but she wouldn't. i looked at this thing for easily 20 minutes. to this day she say's she so sorry for not listening and told me ever since that happened she would always listen to us no matter what it was cause of this experience. she sorta feels like something or someone was putting thoughts in her head to correct me when i was trying to show them what i saw cause she never used to do that , not until that moment. when she finally finished talking to these people with her now ex-husband. she saw the funny airplane. it was a saucer sitting directly above us. it had lights that were rectangler outlining the outer rim of the ship. it also had lights on the inner part too. some were round maybe oval. some were rectangle. they were multi colored. red,blue,yellow,white, green seemed like every color of the rainbow. and the whole thing was spinning around. i can still to this day remember it like it was last night. well she grabbed me up , put me in her car. and her ex got into his truck and we followed him out of there. the whole time there was 2 of these discs. the second one appeared when we were leaving that area. and they flew at an angle. and they seemed to follow us directly over top of us. when we would stop for a stop sign. the disc's would stop too. completely copying our movements. my mom and ex stepfather stopped and he got out and came to our window to talk to her about these things. and thats when they shot off torwards jeanette , pa i don't like telling people this story cause it sounds crazy. but it's the truth. i don't care who believes me. just cause someone thinks it s a joke im not gonna forget this and trick myself into thinking it never happend. cause it did.
Summary: Was little kid about 4 saw funny looking airplane. Tried to get my moms attention to look at it.
